## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchangelegality">LoopInterchangeLegality</a> checks if it is legal to interchange the loop.

### findInductionAndReductions() {#adeb8b3514f8217907a18790fc5e34b56}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoopInterchangeLegality::findInductionAndReductions (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;, 8 &gt; &amp; Inductions, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; InnerLoop)</>}>
Discover induction and reduction PHIs in the header of <code>L</code>.

Induction PHIs are added to <code>Inductions</code>, reductions are added to OuterInnerReductions. When the outer loop is passed, the inner loop needs to be passed as <code>InnerLoop</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopinterchange-cpp/#l00313">313</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopinterchange-cpp">LoopInterchange.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
